channel.title: Syrinity "Our legacy starts here"
channel.description:
[img]http://syrinity.net/images/logo.png[/img]
Information ____________________________
Hello, welcome to Syrinity's project page. We have been in development for about three weeks now working to create the ideal server for all players. We will be striving to create content that our players will enjoy and have fun playing. Our plans in development are to work on one area at a time perfecting that certain feature before moving onto the next. We want to create a smooth gameplay with a large amount of skills, mini-games, bosses and events for our players to use throughout their gameplay. Our server will not be one of which you will be maxing out your skills with in minutes of game time. Our skilling will take some effort due to the fact we look to have skilling have a huge impact in our economy. Combat training will also not be skills you will max out within minutes of gameplay.
Development Team ____________________________
P.L , C.M - Anthony C.M - Jamie S.D - Robert, Landon C.D - Patrick
*Key* P.L (project leader), C.M (Community Management), S.D (Server Development), and C.D (Client Development)
Features ____________________________ -Well setup website (easy to operate) -Server hosted off a vps -Website hosted off a Dedi -All skills working fully functional -Varius bosses (Corp Beast, Kbd, Bork, Choas Elemental, Giant Sea Snake, Godwars (All Four), Giant -Mole, Tormented Demons) -Various minigames (Castle wars, Duel arena, Pest control, Barbarian assult, Warriors guild, Fight -pits, Fight caves) -Automatic Vote and Donation system -Active and friendly staff -Constant upates
Media ____________________________
